name: Stealing C.A.R.E
description:
You are a rouge thief looking to steal some gems known as C.A.R.E (Creedite, Azurite,Ruby, Emerald) from an Orc stronghold in the shortest amount of time. Can you take C.A.R.E?

Controls:

A/D to move

Space to jump (hold to jump higher)

N/M to mute/unmute

P to go back to the menu

K to skip the tutorial

Have fun and try to beat my best time (It's 00:49:63)!

You can download the game, but I only tested it on windows, if other OS's have issues let me know!
